variables.name: AD_Converter_Settings
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1017 Access : R/W (see in device user manual/help file for bit fields details)

variables.name: Low_Pass_Order
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1018 Access : R/W (values supported 0 : filter disable, 2 : order 2 and 3 : order 3)

variables.name: Low_Pass_CutOff_Frequency
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1019 Access : R/W (values supported form 0.1Hz up to 200.0Hz)

variables.name: Mean_Filter_Depth
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1020 Access : R/W (values supported see in user manual/help file)

variables.name: Flow_Filter_Depth
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1021 Access : R/W (values supported see in user manual/help file)

variables.name: Flow_Time_Unit
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1022 Access : R/W (values supported s : second, mn : minutes and h : hours)
